short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a dark mode to the GroupMe web app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a dark mode to the GroupMe web app. It's not the best theme in the world, and the extension isn't the most performant, but I like to think it's good enough
